General.Name: Vidrala S.A
General.Description: Vidrala, S.A., a consumer packaging company, manufactures and sells glass containers for food and beverage products in Spain, the United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Italy, Portugal, and internationally. It provides glass oil bottles and vinegar bottles, beer bottles, preserve food jars, cider bottles and sparkling wine bottles, spirit bottles, wine glass bottles, and juice bottles, as well as bottles for non-alcoholic beverages. The company also offers packaging services, such as logistic solutions and beverage filling. Vidrala, S.A. was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Laudio/Llodio, Spain.
